# Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct

This project adopts the Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct.

- Current version: https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/1/code_of_conduct/
- FAQs: https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq
- Translations: https://www.contributor-covenant.org/translations

Reports of unacceptable behavior can be sent privately to maintainers at the contact listed in `SECURITY.md`.
